deity_markdown: [Blooms Of The Spreading Weald](/Deities.aspx?ID=365), [Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197), [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=282), [Gendowyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=625), [Jaidi](/Deities.aspx?ID=406), [Keltheald](/Deities.aspx?ID=474), [Sovyrian Conclave](/Deities.aspx?ID=381), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=463)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Tree Stride](/Spells.aspx?ID=343)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 378 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Blooms Of The Spreading Weald](/Deities.aspx?ID=365), [Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197), [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=282), [Gendowyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=625), [Jaidi](/Deities.aspx?ID=406), [Keltheald](/Deities.aspx?ID=474), [Sovyrian Conclave](/Deities.aspx?ID=381), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=463)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You step into a living tree with a trunk big enough for you to fit inside it and instantly teleport to any tree of the same species within 5 miles that also has a sufficiently large trunk. Once you enter the first tree, you instantly know the rough locations of other sufficiently large trees of the same species within range and can exit from the original tree, if you prefer. You can't carry extradimensional spaces with you; if you attempt to do so, the spell fails.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The tree you exit can be up to 50 miles away.

**Heightened (8th)** The tree you exit can be up to 500 miles away.

**Heightened (9th)** The tree you exit can be anywhere on the same planet.
name: Tree Stride

**Tradition**

**Deities**
[Blooms Of The Spreading Weald](/Deities.aspx?ID=365), [Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197), [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=282), [Gendowyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=625), [Jaidi](/Deities.aspx?ID=406), [Keltheald](/Deities.aspx?ID=474), [Sovyrian Conclave](/Deities.aspx?ID=381), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=463)

</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Teleport from tree to tree.
</summary>
text: Tree Stride Source Core Rulebook pg. 378 4.0 Tradition Primal Deities Blooms Of The Spreading Weald, Elven Pantheon, Erastil, Gendowyn, Jaidi, Keltheald, Sovyrian Conclave, Yuelral Cast 1 minute (material, somatic, verbal) --- You step into a living tree with a trunk big enough for you to fit inside it and instantly teleport to any tree of the same species within 5 miles that also has a sufficiently large trunk. Once you enter the first tree, you instantly know the rough locations of other sufficiently large trees of the same species within range and can exit from the original tree, if you prefer. You can't carry extradimensional spaces with you; if you attempt to do so, the spell fails. --- Heightened (6th) The tree you exit can be up to 50 miles away. Heightened (8th) The tree you exit can be up to 500 miles away. Heightened (9th) The tree you exit can be anywhere on the same planet.
